infoPlist.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the device’s microphone.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the user’s photo library.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: A message that tells the user why the app is requesting access to the device’s camera.
